code: import axios from'axios';export var setLoaded=function setLoaded(payload){return{type:'SET_LOADED ',payload:payload};};export var fetchPizzas=function fetchPizzas(sortBy,category){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'SET_LOADED',payload:false});axios.get("/pizzas?".concat(category!==null?"category=".concat(category):'',"&_sort=").concat(sortBy.type,"&_order=").concat(sortBy.order)).then(function(_ref){var data=_ref.data;return dispatch(setPizzas(data));});};};export var setPizzas=function setPizzas(items){return{type:'SET_PIZZAS',payload:items};};
